import React, {useEffect} from "react"; import "./intro.scss"; import { Container, Row, Col, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import Rosa from "react-on-scroll-animation"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom" import {Logger, Log} from "../../../utils/logger/logger"; const Intro = () => { const history = useHistory(); useEffect(()=>{ Logger.push(Log.Error({public: "hello huston we have a problem"})) }) return (

Simple - but powerful digital dj software

Kickstart your Dj career

choose your favorite tracks, connect midi controller, record gig and share to your friends

) } export default Intro
